text: In HubSpot Community, is there a way to mark a post as duplicate? If not, then this an an idea :bulb:
y’know what might be kinda nice is if duplicate posts were shown with like a little blurb. “This post appears to be a duplicate or is answered by this post: {{postname/link}}”
that way if someone searches for that answer they might stumble on that duplicate because they used wording closer to that, but still find the answer.
obviously if it’s verbatim the same post that’s different.

The resize_image_url function is quite handy for preventing users from adding images of an obscene size and reducing page weight. One idea to take it to the next level would be adding a *crop* parameter. Something like `{{ resize_image_url("<http://your.HubSpot.site/hubfs/img.jpg>", 300, 300, 300, crop=true) }}` would generate an image that's 300x300px.
basically kinda like stack overflow stuff
